TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1021-1022
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas Gray to Stephen F. Austin, 01-19-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas Gray to Austin, January 19, 1825. Land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1021-1022

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas Gray to Austin, January 19, 1825. Land. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-19-1825">January 19th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir I have made choice of the *location_mentioned*seventh Eighth and 12th Leagues */location_mentioned*if either of these Leagues are vacant please to enter one for me.
*person_mentioned*Mr John Demiss*/person_mentioned* also requests one if there are two yet vacant entered for him. I have made choice of the *location_mentioned*seventh Labour, on the west side of the river*/location_mentioned*.*/p* *p*N. B. those Leagues lies *location_mentioned*near the head of the Bay Prairie*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas Gray*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
